column4: I just made a archive of pictures (tar.gz) can a windows user extrace that?
yes, as long it has a gz capable archive handler, like 7zip and friends
so they have to download 7zip to extrace it?
what are you tring to compile ?
Internet DJ Console, im tygint to compile it from the direct source, the Ubuntu respos the program didn't work right

does it report a specific error ?
